ISSUE.TITLE: pasta is both under development, needing patched podman, and the default
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Issue Description https://github.com/containers/podman/blob/main/docs/tutorials/performance.md#network-performance-for-rootless-podman says: > Use the network driver [pasta](https://passt.top/passt/about/#pasta). Pasta is under development and currently needs a patched Podman to run. But https://blog.podman.io/2024/03/podman-5-0-has-been-released/ states twice, that Pasta is now the default for rootless containers. This is a contradiction: Pasta is both the default and under development. ### Podman in a container No ### Privileged Or Rootless Rootless ### Upstream Latest Release Yes
